Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Morgan/Harrison
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson,  Racine, Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Adams, Des Plaines, Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 69th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 69th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
